abstract: Newly elected London Mayor Sadiq Khan and British Prime Min David Cameron put political differences aside to campaign together in support of Britain remaining in European Union.

headline.print_headline: Cameron and New London Mayor Set Aside Recriminations to Unite on E.U.
headline.main: Sadiq Khan, London’s New Mayor, and David Cameron Find Common Cause Fighting Brexit

snippet: After heated exchanges during the recent mayoral campaign, the prime minister and Sadiq Khan of the Labour Party are working together on European Union vote.
lead_paragraph: After heated exchanges during the recent mayoral campaign, the prime minister and Sadiq Khan of the Labour Party are working together on European Union vote.
